com.dotmarketing.scripting.servlet

Class PHPServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.dotmarketing.scripting.servlet.PHPServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class PHPServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    This class was written originally written for the Scripting Plugin of dotCMS. To configure the PHP Servlet add the following to your web-ext.xml inside the plugin. PHPServlet com.dotmarketing.scripting.servlet.PHPServlet compile true PHPServlet *.php You can use the following init-params compile ini-file mysql-version php-version script-encoding strict page-cache-entries connection-pool datasource
    Author:
    Jason Tesser
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
